meanings.definition: Agree to a demand or request.
meanings.sent1: After much persuasion, she finally agreed to acceding to their request.
meanings.sent2: He always accedes to his boss's instructions without any hesitation.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be acceding to the dog's demand for the sunny spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: The river, acceding to the force of gravity, flowed steadily towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The student reluctantly acceding to the teacher's extra homework assignment.

meanings.sent1: She will be acceding to the role of team captain next season.
meanings.sent2: The new CEO will accede to his position next Monday.
meanings.sent3: The clown accidentally ended up acceding to the role of the king in the play.
meanings.sent4: The young prince acceded to the throne amidst great celebration.
meanings.sent5: The actor will accede to the lead role in the upcoming movie.
